snippet: Newt Gingrich ruffles feathers by canceling a meeting with the governor of Nevada, but has the backing of Donald Trump, according to a senior campaign official.
abstract: Newt Gingrich ruffles feathers by canceling a meeting with the governor of Nevada, but has the backing of Donald Trump, according to a senior campaign official.
lead_paragraph: 10:37 a.m. | Updated RENO, Nev. -- Newt Gingrich swept into Nevada on Wednesday trailing far behind Mitt Romney in state polls and lacking much campaign organization, but his aides were ready to boast of a flashy new endorsement: Donald Trump was supposed to announce his support of Mr. Gingrich on Thursday in Las Vegas, according to a senior campaign official.

headline.main: Gingrich's Flashy New Endorsement Is Not to Be
